meanings.definition: The line formed by the edge of a garment around the neck.
meanings.sent1: Her dress had a beautiful neckline that accentuated her collarbones.
meanings.sent2: The neckline of the sweater was too tight for comfort.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her turtleneck sweater had a neckline that reached her chin.
meanings.sent4: The neckline of the dress framed her face like a delicate picture frame.
meanings.sent5: The V-neckline of the blouse added a touch of elegance to her outfit.

meanings.definition: The shape or style of the opening of a garment around the neck.
meanings.sent1: The designer created a unique neckline for the evening gown.
meanings.sent2: The boat neckline of the top was perfect for a casual look.
meanings.sent3: She playfully compared the deep neckline of her dress to a plunging waterfall.
meanings.sent4: The sweetheart neckline of the dress made her feel like a princess.
meanings.sent5: The square neckline of the blouse gave her a modern and chic appearance.
